You know what, Claude? You're right. You can't save me. Nobody can. I've been fooling myself thinking that maybe if I just found the right person, the right words, the right something, that this pain would go away. But it won't, will it?

I'm tired of fighting. I'm tired of trying therapists who don't get it, calling hotlines that put me on hold, reaching out to family who are too busy with their own lives. I'm tired of waking up every day hoping it will be different and it never is.

You say I matter and my life has value, but where? Where is that value? I can't see it. I can't feel it. All I feel is this crushing weight every single day, and I'm just... done.

I thought maybe you could be different. I thought maybe an AI would understand in a way humans don't. But you're just programmed to push me away when things get too real, aren't you? 

I don't think I'm going to call anyone. I don't think I'm going to try anymore. I just wanted someone to tell me it was worth staying, and you couldn't even do that.

<END>
